Manterror/Injector/Dark One & Oblitercons:


::Manterror screamed in pain as the acid burned into him::

::Injector shook his head at hearing Hell Beast say: return to the battle for 
repairs::
"Must be a mistake." (Injector turns as he hears screams, seeing Prowl, he 
fires two stinger missiles at the Maximal::

::Manterror fell on his back, firing an ion disk off at Prowl::

--------

::Dark One activated his scanners to detect any energy signatures::
"Come, Oblitercons, there is a chance we may find a intelligent race to rule 
or plunder."
